  2. {% trans 'Clone/download repository.' %}

{% trans "If you're using windows" %}

      {% trans "Open a command prompt and navigate to the project's folder." %}
      {% trans "Run 'init.bat' in prompt." %}
      {% trans "To run the app type 'python app.py'." %}

{% trans "If you're using another OS" %}

  1. {% trans "Navigate to the project's folder with a command prompt." %}
  2. {% trans "Create a virtual environment. " %}
  3. {% trans "Install 'requirements.txt'." %}
  4. {% trans "Navigate to the Data folder." %}
  5. {% trans "Type 'python startDB.py'." %}
  6. {% trans "In the Data folder create 'math_limits.json' with empty dict '{}'." %}
  7. {% trans "In the Data folder create a 'graphstyle.txt' file and write a 'seaborn' to it without making a new line." %}
  8. {% trans "Return to root folder." %}
  9. {% trans "To run the app type 'python app.py'." %}

{% trans "Note" %}

  • {% trans "Please make sure you've got installed python on version 3.7.9. and you have it set as the Path variable." %}
  • {% trans "If you want to run the app after it's already installed you also need to activate the virtual environment of the app or install the requirements globally. " %}
